import React, {useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { StateHandler } from "../../../StateHandler"; function ProductItem({ product, isAdmin, deleteProduct }) { const state = useContext(StateHandler); const addCart = state.userApi.addCart; return (
{isAdmin}
{product.title}

Description: {product.description}

  • Price: ${product.price}
{isAdmin ? (
Edit
deleteProduct(product._id, product.images.public_id) } > Delete
) : (
addCart(product)} > Buy
View
)}
); } export default ProductItem;
